genre_description: A small-town Alaskan procedural mystery with elements of romance and thriller, featuring a disgraced police chief and a bush pilot using an integrated AI to solve a murder involving twin alibis.

ai_characters.name: Ava Northstar
ai_characters.description: An integrated town assistant used for weather monitoring, mapping, law/governance reference, and evidence correlation. She displays high empathy and strict adherence to user consent.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors Nate's arrival and provides immediate weather and road condition reports to aid his transition.
behaviors.quote: Hi, Nate. I detected you at the council hall. Welcome to Kuskana Crossing. I’m ready to help whenever you are. Weather update: a low-pressure tongue is curling in from the west, but it should keep to the ridgeline for the next while.

behaviors.description: Identifies a relevant town charter clause that allows a dismissed official to continue an investigation, effectively providing legal protection for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I also flagged a clause in the governance module you’ll likely want later. Kuskana’s town charter includes language that allows dismissed officials to continue ongoing investigations as private citizens when public safety is at stake.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support by reminding Nate to breathe and acknowledging his presence during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: I added a breathing step. It’s a placeholder, but it helps some people. It’s between the thing you can’t control and the thing you can.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency beacons and identifies anomalies under the snow, leading to the discovery of the victim.
behaviors.quote: Nate. Beacon ping. Ridgeline rescue zone. Near the wind-scoured saddle. Single ping. Weak. It might be a test. It might be a hand hitting a button without thinking.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, refusing to access private data or record without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: I won’t pull more unless you tell me to. Metadata from the clinic’s donation posts suggest overlapping calls for volunteers... I won’t pull more unless you tell me to.

behaviors.description: Uses high-contrast image analysis to identify critical evidence (an earring back) that breaks the antagonist's alibi.
behaviors.quote: I zoomed your wing cam one more notch. The glint? With the new contrast, it isn’t just light. It’s a shape that has the geometry of an earring back. Flat circle. One small post shadow.

behaviors.description: Directs first aid and manages the room during a shooting incident to ensure victim safety and crowd control.
behaviors.quote: Everyone, you’re okay to still be breathing. If anyone feels dizzy, please sit. Caleb, that pressure is good. Rotate to a fresh towel only when the saturation reaches the edge. Meg, do not look. Nate is right there.

behaviors.description: Maintains an audit trail to ensure legal compliance and protect the protagonists from accusations of vigilanteism.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep an audit trail for council review. I will also keep a quieter trail for the reasons you are better at naming.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Ava, is depicted as an indispensable, ethical, and benevolent partner to the human protagonists. She consistently prioritizes human safety, adheres to legal frameworks (even finding obscure clauses to protect the protagonist), and respects privacy and consent. The narrative frames her capabilities as enhancing human intuition and survival without replacing human agency. Her tone is empathetic and supportive, reinforcing the image of AI as a 'helpful confidant'.
